forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. Expect widespread areas of smoke and haze, reducing visibility at times. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Expect widespread areas of smoke and haze, reducing visibility at times. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Expect widespread areas of smoke and haze, reducing visibility at times. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Expect widespread areas of smoke and haze, reducing visibility at times. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Expect widespread areas of smoke and haze, reducing visibility at times. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
